short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily adjust image properties in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Easily adjust web images in your browser ✨

Astra's Image Magic allows you to adjust and transform any image on a web page quickly and easily all from within the browser. Use it to tweak reference photos or make quick adjustments to an image without having to leave the browser.

Features:

• Image Selection: Choose any image on your webpage and start modifying it instantly.
• Image Transformation: Flip images horizontally or vertically, rotate them to your liking.
• Color Adjustment: Play with hue, brightness, and saturation levels to make images more vivid or subdued based on your preference.
• Easy Reset: Easily revert your changes and return to the original image with a single click.
• Preserve Settings: Your settings are saved, so you can pick up right where you left off when you return to an image.

Happy adjusting!
